summary: This module sets up an OME-NGFF Zarr hierarchy for CellVoyager multiplexed imaging datasets. It parses file names and Yokogawa metadata, organizes wells and rows/columns, validates channel information, defines OMERO channel specifications, creates plate and well metadata structures, prepares region‑of‑interest tables, and writes necessary metadata tables into a newly created Zarr group, handling overwrites as needed.
business_intent: Enable automated conversion of CellVoyager multiplexed microscopy data into the standardized OME-NGFF format within Fractal pipelines, facilitating scalable storage, sharing, and downstream image analysis.
